metadata.title: CVE-2023-5854 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Profiles in Google Chrome prior to 119.0.6045.105 alloweda remote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific UI gestures topotentially exploit heap corruption via specific UI gestures. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
